name: Guess How Much I Love You
author: Kamrl Khan
details: A heartwarming story about love. This book features a captivating narrative that explores the depths of affection. It's a delightful journey of expressing love in various ways.

name: JavaScript
author: John Doe
details: A comprehensive guide to JavaScript programming. This book covers fundamental concepts and advanced techniques, making it an essential resource for both beginners and experienced developers.

name: React pro+
author: Jane Smith
details: Advanced techniques for React development. Dive deep into React with this comprehensive guide. It covers the latest features, best practices, and advanced concepts to enhance your React skills.

name: Python pro
author: Alan Johnson
details: Master Python programming with this guide. This book provides a hands-on approach to Python, covering essential topics, practical examples, and tips for effective coding.

name: The C Programming Language
author: Emily White
details: Classic book on C programming. Explore the fundamentals of C programming with this timeless classic. It covers syntax, data structures, and programming principles in-depth.

name: React
author: Michael Brown
details: Essential concepts for React developers. Master the core concepts of React with this guide. It provides insights into state management, component lifecycle, and advanced React patterns.

name: Data Science with Python
author: Alice Johnson
details: Explore the world of data science using Python. This book covers data analysis, machine learning, and visualization with practical examples and real-world applications.

name: Machine Learning Mastery
author: David Miller
details: Master machine learning algorithms with hands-on examples. Dive into the world of machine learning with this comprehensive guide. It covers algorithms, models, and practical implementation.

name: Design Patterns
author: Erin Taylor
details: Classic book on software design patterns. Learn about software design patterns and best practices in this classic book. It covers principles that enhance software design and maintainability.

name: The Art of UX Design
author: Gary Anderson
details: A guide to creating compelling user experiences. Explore the principles and practices of UX design in this comprehensive guide. It covers user research, prototyping, and interaction design.
